trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona la compatibilidad visual en tiempo de diseño para los controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> class provides the visual representation for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> clase proporciona la representación visual de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class and adds validation to verify that the associated control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or derived type.
trans-unit.target: Se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> clase y agrega la validación para comprobar que el control asociado es un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control o tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> inherits a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property from its parent that is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> hereda un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad de su elemento primario que siempre se establece en `true`.

trans-unit.source: This causes the visual design environment to generate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to hold a temporary copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> on the design surface; this copy is then persisted into markup.
trans-unit.target: Esto hace que el entorno de diseño visual generar un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control para mantener una copia temporal de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> en la superficie de diseño; esta copia se conserva en el marcado.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to return `false`, the visual design environment generates markup directly from the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Si invalida el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad para devolver `false`, el entorno de diseño visual genera marcado directamente desde los datos reales <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts designers generally act much like regular control designers; the principal methods for setting design-time appearance derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de los elementos Web generalmente actúan como diseñadores de controles normales; los métodos principales para establecer el aspecto de tiempo de diseño que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the design-time markup associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: En concreto, puede invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para cambiar el marcado en tiempo de diseño asociado al control.

trans-unit.source: You can likewise override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods to handle errors and empty strings (""), respectively.
trans-unit.target: Del mismo modo, puede invalidar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> métodos para controlar los errores y las cadenas vacías (""), respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the interaction between a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la interacción entre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control y sus asociados <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control from which the end user selects his or her birthday, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to submit the selection, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to display a message on the user's birthday.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control desde el que el usuario final seleccione su cumpleaños, un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control para enviar la selección y un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control para mostrar un mensaje en el cumpleaños del usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> verifies that the associated control is of the expected type and then customizes the design-time rendering of said control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> comprueba que el control asociado es del tipo esperado y, a continuación, personaliza la representación en tiempo de diseño de dicho control.

trans-unit.source: Note that the visual customizations of the designer are visible only at design time, whereas those of the associated control are visible at both run time and design time.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la personalización visual del diseñador está visible solo en tiempo de diseño, mientras que los del control asociado están visibles en tiempo de ejecución y tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: All the methods overridden in this example derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class.
trans-unit.target: Todos los métodos reemplazados en este ejemplo se derivan el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase base.

trans-unit.source: For other available members and their use, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para otros miembros disponibles y su uso, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control associated with this designer.
Binds the designer to a control and validates that the control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Enlaza el diseñador a un control y valida que el control sea un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
